name: Iron Warriors: T - 72 Tank Command
description: The most devastating mechanized armor to ever roll onto a battlefield is brought to life in Iron Warriors: T72-Tank Command. This epic combat simulator allows the player to command an entire platoon of tanks and ALL associated support units, or assume the role of ANY member in a complete tank crew!
minimum_requirements: Minimum System Requirements: Windows XP, 1Ghz Athlon or Pentium III CPU, 256MB RAM; DirectX 9.0 Compatible Video Card (ex: Geforce 2/4MX or Radeon 7500), DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound Card, 2 Gigabyte free space on Hard drive, DirectX 9.0c
